short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for solving the NYT crossword.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to add keyboard shortcuts and other improvements to the NYT Crossword solving experience. 

Current shortcuts include:
- Pause/Unpause (CMD/CTRL+SHIFT+space)
- Toggle Pencil mode (CMD/CTRL+E)
- Zoom into puzzle (CMD/CTRL+SHIFT+Z)
